citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 13:10 on
17-AUG-16.
A facility representative was not available to allow access at 13:10 on 08/16/16. A phone call confirmed that no
representative was available. Inspection report sent via email to facility representative on 8/17/16.
